com.jb.couponsystem.webservices

Class CompanyWebServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jb.couponsystem.webservices.CompanyWebServices

  • @RestController
public class CompanyWebServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class operates as a web service. It contains methods that allow the company logged in the Coupon System to obtain data from and to make changes in the database. Its methods create the instance of CompanyFacade class for the logged in company and call it to execute its methods.
    Author:
    Alexander Zablotsky

    • Method Detail

      • doGetLoginCompanyName

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getlogincompany",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String doGetLoginCompanyName(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to display its companyName. It creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it calls getLoginCompanyName method of the created facade.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        Returns:
        name of the logged in company

      • doGetCouponTypes

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcoupontypes",
                method=GET)
public java.util.List<CouponType> doGetCouponTypes(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to display all the values of the enum CouponType. It creates the array of enum values and returns it.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        Returns:
        array of enum CouponType values

      • doGetAllCoupons

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcoupon",
                method=GET)
public java.util.Collection<Coupon> doGetAllCoupons(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to display all its coupons that exist in the database. It creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it calls getAllCoupons method of the created facade.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        Returns:
        list of coupons of the company

      • doGetCoupon

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcoupon/{id}",
                method=GET)
public Coupon doGetCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                             @PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                             int id)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to display its coupon with certain ID from the database. The ID is received as a variable with the request and is mapped in method's URL. The method creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it calls getCoupon method of the created facade.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        id - of the requested coupon
        Returns:
        the requested coupon of the company

      • doGetCouponsByType

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcouponbytype/{stringtype}",
                method=GET)
public java.util.Collection<Coupon> doGetCouponsByType(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                        @PathVariable(value="stringtype")
                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String stringtype)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to display all its coupons of certain type that exist in the database. The type is received as a string variable with the request and is mapped in method's URL. It creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it calls getCouponsByPrice method of the created facade.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        stringtype - type of coupon as String object
        Returns:
        list of coupons of the company of the given type

      • doGetCouponsByPrice

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcouponbyprice/{price}",
                method=GET)
public java.util.Collection<Coupon> doGetCouponsByPrice(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="price")
                                                                                                                                                                     double price)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to display all its coupons under certain price that exist in the database. The price is received as a variable with the request and is mapped in method's URL. It creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it calls getCouponsByPrice method of the created facade.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        price - of coupon
        Returns:
        list of coupons of the company under the given price

      • doGetCouponsByEndDate

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcouponbyenddate/{stringenddate}",
                method=GET)
public java.util.Collection<Coupon> doGetCouponsByEndDate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable(value="stringenddate")
                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String stringenddate)
                                                                                                                                                                          throws java.text.ParseException
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to display all its coupons that expire before certain end date in the database. The end date is received as a variable with the request and is mapped in method's URL. It creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it calls getCouponsByEndDate method of the created facade.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        end - date of coupon
        Returns:
        list of coupons of the company under the given price
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if the given end date is not a valid date

      • doPostCoupon

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcoupon",
                method=POST)
public void doPostCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                        Coupon c)
                                                                                                                 throws CouponAlreadyExistsException
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to create coupon object sent in the body of the request in the database. It creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it calls createCoupon method of the created facade.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        c - coupon object sent in the body of the request
        Throws:
        CouponAlreadyExistsException - thrown by the method of the facade

      • doPutCoupon

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcoupon/{id}",
                method=PUT)
public void doPutCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                           @RequestBody
                                                                                                                           Coupon sent,
                                                                                                                           @PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                           int id)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to update its coupon with the certain ID in the database. The ID is received as a variable with the request and is mapped in method's URL. It creates the instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it creates the coupon instance using the received ID. Then it sets the coupon PRICE and END DATE attributes to be the same as of the coupon sent in the body of the request. Finally it calls updateCoupon method of the created facade which receives the created coupon instance as its signature.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        sent - updated coupon sent in the body of the request
        id - of the requested coupon

      • doDeleteCoupon

        @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/getcoupon/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public void doDeleteCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                 @PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                                 int id)
        This method executes the request of the logged in company to remove its coupon with the certain ID from the database. The ID is received as a variable with the request and is mapped in method's URL. The method creates instance of companyFacade class for the logged in company using getFacade method of the present class. Then it creates the coupon instance using the received ID. Finally it calls removeCoupon method of the created facade which receives the created coupon instance as its signature.
        Parameters:
        request - of the logged in company
        id - of the requested coupon
